opening_theme: #1: "Danchi de DAN! RAN! (団地でDAN!RAN!) by Dohatsuten feat. Kiyosaku (MONGOL800) (怒髪天feat.キヨサク（MONGOL800）)

ending_theme: #1: "Start Line! (スタートライン！)" by Sonar Pocket (eps 1-20)
#2: "Super Smiler (スーパスマイラー)" by LIFriends (eps 21-39)
#3: "Akane (アカネ)" by a flood of circle (eps 40-52)
#4: "Friends! Friends! (フレンズ！フレンズ！)" by Rico (eps 53-65)
#5: "Futari de Arukeba (ふたりで歩けば)" by Aoi Yamazaki (eps 66-78)
